Package com.carrotsearch.hppc

Class CharStack

java.lang.Object
com.carrotsearch.hppc.CharArrayList
com.carrotsearch.hppc.CharStack
All Implemented Interfaces:
Accountable, CharCollection, CharContainer, CharIndexedContainer, Preallocable, Cloneable, Iterable<CharCursor>, RandomAccess
@Generated(date="2021-12-15T09:58:17+0100", value="KTypeStack.java") public class CharStack extends CharArrayList
A subclass of CharArrayList adding stack-related utility methods. The top of the stack is at the CharArrayList.size() - 1 element.

  • Field Summary

    • push

      public final void push(char... elements)
      Vararg-signature method for pushing elements at the top of the stack.

      This method is handy, but costly if used in tight loops (anonymous array passing)
